metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1105 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper access control vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 13.11 prior to 14.7.7, 14.8 prior to 14.8.5, and 14.9 prior to 14.9.2 allows an unauthorized user to access pipeline analytics even when public pipelines are disabled

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
